title: Cant login?
body:
I just finished an awful ranked game and it said the server was not responding, i restarted client and got a small update and now i cant login. It says the servers are running fine but apparently not.
Is anyone else having this trouble?

replies.body:
Hey Hurricane x,

Riot is aware of the issue and is working to resolve it as soon as possible. Check out the announcement by Agent Mindstar below:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/kbVzswc0-login-issues-4th-feb-2016
